feed.title: VoucherVault Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.19.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] Visual improvements regarding shared items and a new filter in inventory view.

Sharing center now indicates who shared an item with you.

Features

  • improve sharing views (9dfc473)

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.20.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] It's now possible to define the display preferences for the inventory view. You can decide what item values are shown or hidden

Features

  • adjust display preferences (d851ba0), closes #85

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.21.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] You can now freely choose the tile-color of your inventory items

Features

  • color picker for inventory tiles (5d558c5), closes #86
